Satan Clause
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Satan Clause
By shmo55 on Saturday, November 7, 2009 - 12:53 pm:

I started to play Monster Rancher 2 again, and I recently unlocked the wracky species. I didn't really feel like training it at the time so i put it in my freezer. After this, I noticed in the CD list that "Satan Clause" could be obtained off of the Maria Carey CD. I had that CD lying around my house and so I checked it and it had the same bar code and catalog number. However, when i put it in I was told that I was not authorized to make this monster. What did I do wrong?

P.S. I'm new here but I have been reading this site for a while. It's really great.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, November 7, 2009 - 08:04 pm:

Did you actually make a Wracky from the doll? You can't just get the doll, you have to make one and take it to the ranch to be unlocked.

That said, there are different pressing for every CD and it could be a different monster.

By shmo55 on Sunday, November 8, 2009 - 08:02 am:

Once I got the doll i killed a hare that I got from the market and the wracky named "Charles" came out. I immediately put him in the freezer.

It was probably just a different pressing then.
